title: Medicine in Sport (TEFC)
creator_credit: Tom Poole, Ken Ashton and Annabel Olivier-Wright
brief_description: Provides an in-depth look at training routines of top soccer stars. Traces the history of soccer, and also looks at the basic skills every soccer player needs.
